subject: Football
High Net Worth Individuals
Millionaires and Billionaires
lead_paragraph: Stephen Ross, a New York real estate billionaire, became the majority owner of the Miami Dolphins, completing his purchase of 95 percent of the team for $1 billion.
snippet: Stephen Ross, a New York real estate billionaire, became the majority owner of the Miami Dolphins, completing his purchase of 95 percent of the team for $1 billion.
